name: Striker Manager 2: Lead your Football Team
name_original: Striker Manager 2: Lead your Football Team
description:
BE THE MASTER OF YOUR OWN FOOTBALL TEAM

Now it is possible thanks to Striker Manager, with exclusive 3D game simulator.

Join our great community and compete against managers from all over the world, and prove you are the best manager ever!

You will experience firsthand many tasks of a football manager, you get full powers to make decisions

● FREE TO PLAY ANYTIME ANYWHERE

● CUSTOMIZE YOUR SPORT TOWN

● LIVE FOOTBALL WITH 3D GAMES SIMULATOR

● WIN REWARDS

● SET THE BEST SQUAD

● COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS AND LEAD YOUR TEAM TO GLORY

● BUILD YOUR STADIUM

● WINNING FORMATION AND TACTIC

● LOOKING FOR FUTURE STARS IN SCHOOLS AND HPC

Join us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/strikermanagerofficialgroup

Follow us on Twitter:
http://www.twitter.com/striker_manager
